children.content: History of coronary artery disease/MI/CHF, Advancing age (>35)
Younger age (<35), Recurrent symptoms for >3 yr
Differentiate between LBBB- and RBBB-type patterns and apply morphologic analysis
QRS duration >140 ms, Left axis deviation <-30°, V1: absence of normal rSR' morphology, V6: R:S ratio <1, Positive concordance
QRS duration >160 ms, Right axis deviation >90°, V1: broad R >40 ms, delayed R to S duration >100 ms, V6: any Q wave, Negative concordance
